home.title: Hi, I’m Ben 🦁
home.description: Hello! I’m a friendly digital marketing consultant from the UK, living in London. You’ll find usually find me talking about freelancing, marketing, running a small business, tech for good, traveland general London life. I run Empower. We’re a digital marketing agency for charities and nonprofits. My book Freelance in 30 Days is available in paperback and ebook from Gumroad.
